website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour SpeedForm Slingride gained praise for its high-quality construction and its efficient features. Many runners were also impressed by its eye-catching looks. They said that this neutral shoe was great for running and for casual use. Overall, the shoe was a fruitful release.
pros: One tester commented that the Under Armour SpeedForm Slingride was the most comfortable one they ever owned
Many runners welcomed its appealing and eye-catching design
The lightweight nature of this model was adequate for those who tried it
Reviewers noted that the cool-looking aesthetics made it agreeable for casual use
A user wrote that the upper unit was able to hug their foot securely, but not too tightly
The upper garnered appreciation because it felt like a sock and that it didn’t irritate the feet of the testers
The underfoot foam unit was able to deliver the right amounts of cushioning without feeling too overbearing, according to one tester
cons: The foot of a reviewer slid around the interior when they used it for running, and it felt uncomfortable for them
The upper unit felt thin for a runner, and they didn’t feel like it would last many running sessions

customer_reviews.title: These are the most amazing shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing shoes I've ever had. They are super light and breathable. They also fit like socks. They're so comfortable. I have nearly flat feet and these shoes really help a ton. My feet don't hurt in them. I use them for running (3-6 miles every other day) and training. (CrossFit/HIIT) . Be careful training because they do not offer a lot of side support. I would love to find similar UA shoes for training. But haven't had anything that comes close to these
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mixture of a natural and supportive shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these for both weight lifting and cardio. He has them in three different colors now. Originally, he was a fan of Nike Free sneakers, and these were recommended as an alternative. He likes them even better! He says they're the perfect mixture of being a natural and supportive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes! Own 3 pairs so I can wear them for years. Love how flexible and breathable they are. So light and perfect for my wide female feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Canares

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. As a matter of fact I love them so much I ordered a second grey pair. They came with green soles. I didn't order green soles. I tried again. Same results. They feel great. Just wish the right ones would deliver. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Hands Down

customer_reviews.title: I wanna give these a 5 star but let me ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanna give these a 5 star but let me tell you what I did personally. I took out all the laces besides the front or two scissored them off because they were just too tight! give it one or two weeks for you're feet to break in. then buy new show laces (I bought green) and walah they felt normal So other than it being to tight it would have been 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome! Bought them for my daughter and she has ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! Bought them for my daughter and she has raved about how comfortable they are... run a teensy bit small so we ordered 1/2 size larger. She says they fit like a glove - like she's not wearing shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes out there!
customer_reviews.text: I personally own 4 pairs of these shoes, I love them so much. You can literally be on your feet all day with these! I bought the anthem red/ black for my brother as a birthday gift, and he loved them so much as well! :) They fit perfectly just as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sneakers!

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy wearing this shoes, fit as expected and very light. You just don't feel as if you are wearing anything. Amazing product, well done UA

customer_reviews.text: These are probably a 4.5/5. My only complaint would be that after walking 5+ miles they do start to hurt in my arcs buuuuuuuuut it's nothing major and overall are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my fiancee for Christmas. He says the shoes is very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Love them, man
customer_reviews.text: I've ran in these shoes countless times now! I have to say that they are still as comfortable as the first time I put them on -- there is simply nothing that beats that snug-to-skin feel of mesh on your feet. It is rather lightweight due to this, and allows me to perform without worrying about my feet. If you enjoy running shoes that minimize the entire 'wearing a running shoe' feel, I would definitely invest in these.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, the only issue is they slip on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, the only issue is they slip on and off so easily, Great that they slip on, but if you are running and cutting the shoes will come right off.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love UA shoes
customer_reviews.text: UA has become my only brand of shoes now. Bought more than 5 pairs since!

customer_reviews.title: not great for running
customer_reviews.text: Toes have a lot of wiggle room because of the material being elastic, not great for running.

customer_reviews.title: Lasting, comfortable runnng shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, breathable shoe. I have run 100+ miles in them and no signs of wear.

customer_reviews.text: love the look , just as pictured . Also fit nice and stay cool on your feet.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Company I purchased through was fine the shoe was

customer_reviews.text: The 2nd time I wore them the back tread came loose. Fastest shoe to fall apart that I have ever purchased. But, the shoe was very comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sneakers I've ever had. Low profile and breathable fabric makes them less bulky and lighter weight than a lot of others.

customer_reviews.title: the fit is great and comfortable for

customer_reviews.title: I loved my first pair so much I ordered another pair ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first pair so much I ordered another pair when the old ones got to looking worn (the old ones are still good though).

customer_reviews.text: Had these for 3 days and my pinky toes started coming through the sides. Do not buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive for such a flimsy shoe. Time will tell if they hold up. And yes they run small, 1/2 size. I won't buy them again. It took over a month to be delivered. And then they drop the price $20 after I bought mine, now I'm really disappointed in them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent show! Very comfortable and feels good on my feet. Great for walking outside, running track and trails.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Speedform Slingride Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Under Armour Speedform Slingride Running Shoes The Under Armour Speedform Slingride Running Shoes offer an unprecedented precision fit and provides unrivalled comfort, as well as a two-piece charged cushioning midsole to help slingshot you into the lead. Innovative UA speedform technology delivers an unprecedented precision fit that offers unrivalled comfort and inhibits any distractions that can occur. Also featuring in the speedform slingride running shoes is Dyneema, the world's strongest fibre, Woven into the upper that provides ultimate in durable flexibility ensuring you perform and go for longer. A padded tongue construction with soft sandwich mesh materials increases comfort and fit of the shoe allowing you to stay focused on the run ahead. Seamless asymmetric zonal compression slingshots your feet from heel to toe throughout the gait cycle, whilst a two-piece charged cushioning midsole pairs a soft, plush layer of foam on top of a layer of dense, harder foam for the ultimate blend of support and comfort. A full-length rubber outsole increases durability, traction and support with less weight ensuring you can run at your peak level for longer.
feature_bullets: Innovative UA SpeedForm construction molds to the foot for a precision fit, eliminating all distraction
Threadborne upper for a breathable, compression like fit that delivers lightweight directional strength
Dyneema, the world's strongest fiber, woven into the upper for the ultimate in durable flexibility
Seamless compression slingshots your feet from heel to toe quicker than ever before
Padded tongue constructed with soft sandwich mesh materials to incre
